.antispamcloud.com.._comment: Some <RCPT TO> take 30s to respond (sometimes only on 2nd attempt, not deterministic), so we skip the catch-all one, and bump the timeout to well over 30s.

SmtpTimeout45s._comment: Set SMTP connection timeout to at least 45s. If the user request set an even higher timeout, take that one. Please note that this timeout is **per SMTP connection**. By default, we try 2 connections per email: if the 1st one failed, then we connect again to avoid potential greylisting, in which case the whole verification takes 1min30s.
